Text:
hey...I thought I heard a commercial for this show say that this was "The Final Chapter" of DBZ Kai.

Do you know - Are they going to do the Majin Buu Saga?
No Buu saga, they didn't do it in Japan.

That's kinda a bummer...considering how the Cell Saga ends.  Not the way I would like the show to wrap up.  But that's OK.

oh and thanks for the great uploads
